title: Haven't received update of Android 11 yet? Using pixel 4 xl
content: Been a while now .. assistant on my device have gone silent .. whenever I ask something all.i get is the answers on screen ..no voice at all! It's so frustrating..did all the trouble shooting steps. Spoke to your team also regarding the same but haven't received any solution for that from your end. Using pixel 4 xl
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
